replies.body: this isnt even funny....theres gonna be kids that see this and be like HAHA LOOK EVERYONE IM DOING RAINBOW BUILD LOOK AT ME ACKNOWLEDGE ME GIVE ME ATTENTION BE MY FRIEND
Your salt is like a beach, be a rainbow, it's much more fulfilling.
Haha dude I like rainbows haha
Someone else did this but they actually played the game to get these builds

Change RFC for a deadman's, it's not entirely red, but it would make the build very viable.

That Green build will haunt my nightmares.

Purple, you could go ZZ'Rot and Ohmwrecker, I'd even call Mortal Reminder purple (and you could totally do devourer)

Yellow build looks basically like a tank AP yi build at this point and time, sure it has more crit than AP but it serves the same purpose, that said, Trinity force, Nashor's could easily be subbed in for the crit, and even Randuin's would fit into this (if you don't want sunfire)

The Red one looks legitimate on maybe a Fiora? Except the Rapid Firecannon might not do much, like it's not _good_ but could be? Maybe the Purple on a Cho? Yellow on maybe, Yi? idk Xin? Green one.......... maybe..... Trundle? rofl
